channel.title: +5 on कल्पान्तरे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +5 on कल्पान्तरे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: Appendix of Long Sanskrit Passages
item.description: 828 History of Dharmasāstra [Vol. APPENDIX-of long Sanskrit Passages Cated to the courts Column.09, p. 1059 arkea and som Page 118 Note 267. On pp. 117-118 above reference has boon niade to the re-admission into the Hindu fold of those that had been converted to Christianity or Islam by force or fraud or even voluntarily. Not only was there re-admission of those that were converted, but non-Hindus, such as Yavanas, Kiratas, Śakas, were absorbed into the Hindu fold and vere induced to adopt the practices of Hindus (such as śrāddhas and gifts to brahmanas) Vide Santiparva chap.

item.title: General Index
item.description: GENERAL INDEX OF 5 , Vol. IV (of the History of Dharmaśāstra ) - (N. B. This Index deals with pages 1-727 only. As the list of tīrthas from p 730 opwards is arranged alphabetically, no entries from these pages are included in this Index, except in very rare cases for special reasons. When the name of a person or work occurs both in the body of the book as well as in the foot-notes on the same page, only the page is entered and nothing else ).
